Euphronius painted: Krater of Heracles and Antaeus ...
The Hidden side of cards: the cheat with the ace of diamonds (about 1635) by Georges De La Tour (Vic sur Seille 1593 - Luneville 1652)

The Mirror of paradoxes: self-portraits, Rembrandt Van Rijn
